review: This is by far the most useful online streaming device I have bought. Amazon videos, nexflix, youtube,.... all in one place and of course portable. Any hotel has nowadays HDMI port and bringing this device will allow me to avoid watching useless TV chanels in hotel while traveling. Also attaching it to car Video system will allow kids watch some movies on iphone hotspot! Overall this is a great buy specially if you have prime membership to take advantage of on demand movies that Kids would watch anytime and anywhere.
